author: Mrinalini Sundar
title: Saiyami Kher in Mani Ratnam’s next
text:
After Dulquer Salmaan and Keerthy Suresh opted out of Mani Ratnam's next, the latest buzz is that the actress Saiyami Kher has been approached to play an important character in the film. Saiyami is currently working on Mirziya directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra.
Says a source close to the project, "Saiyami has auditioned and is most likely to be finalised in the next few days. The team is still in the casting stage, so it will take a couple of days for Mani Ratnam to announce the final line-up of actors."
The untitled film's cast currently includes Karthi, Nani and Nithya Menen in the lead. The music for the film is by A R Rahman.
